current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To prohibit any regulation regarding carbon dioxide or
		  other greenhouse gas emissions reduction in the United States until China,
		  India, and Russia implement similar reductions.

committee-name.#text:
Committee on Environment and Public
			 Works
